title: Title VI - Contract of Sale
coverage: Nature, obligations of vendor and vendee, delivery, warranties, remedies

required_clauses.name: item_description
required_clauses.requirement: Thing must be determinate and described

required_clauses.name: purchase_price
required_clauses.requirement: Price must be certain and in money

required_clauses.name: payment_terms
required_clauses.description: When and how payment is made
required_clauses.default: At time and place of delivery

purchase_price.description: Price must be certain (zero price = donation, not sale)

installment_sales.description: Special rules apply for installment sales

seller_obligations.obligation: Transfer ownership of the thing sold
Deliver thing with accessions and accessories
Deliver in condition at time of perfection

buyer_obligations.obligation: Pay at agreed time and place

warranties.description: Seller warrants buyer shall have legal and peaceful possession
Seller responsible for hidden defects rendering thing unfit
Seller has right to sell at time ownership passes
Thing shall be free from undeclared charges

transfer_of_ownership.rule: Ownership transfers upon actual or constructive delivery
transfer_of_ownership.perfection: Contract perfected at meeting of minds on thing and price

risk_of_loss.exception: Fungible things sold by weight/number/measure - risk passes upon delivery

breach_of_warranty: Accept and set up breach by way of recoupment
Refuse to accept and sue for damages
Rescind and return goods, recover price

seller_remedies.non_payment_immovable: May rescind after judicial or notarial demand
seller_remedies.non_payment_movable: Automatic rescission upon expiration if buyer doesn't appear/pay

earnest_money.rule: Earnest money is part of price and proof of perfection

right_to_withhold_delivery.rule: Seller may withhold delivery if buyer hasn't paid and no period fixed

suspension_of_payment.rule: Buyer may suspend payment if disturbed in possession

when_owed: If buyer in default after demand

form_of_contract.rule: May be written, oral, or inferred from conduct (subject to Statute of Frauds)

vendor_remedies.description: Special remedies for personal property sold on installment
remedies: Exact fulfillment if vendee fails to pay
Foreclose chattel mortgage if 2+ installments unpaid

right_to_transfer_check.description: Vendor must have right to transfer ownership

payment_terms_check.description: If not stipulated, payment at delivery

default_terms.delivery_condition: In condition at time of perfection
default_terms.warranties: All implied warranties apply unless waived
default_terms.risk_of_loss: Passes to buyer upon delivery (or ownership transfer for specific things)

statute_of_frauds.description: Certain sales must be in writing to be enforceable
applies_to: Sale of personal property PHP 500 or more
Sale not to be performed within one year
statute_of_frauds.note: Oral contract is valid but not enforceable by action
